education: YixueHao received the B.Sc. degree in College of mathematics and Information Science from Henan Univerisity, Kaifeng, China in 2012. Currently, he is a Ph.D candidate in School of Computer Science and Technology, HUST since 2014. His research interests include 5G, SDN, cloud computing and the Internet of Things.
research_interest: 5G, SDN, cloud computing and the Internet of Things.
